cwipp.MODplume.explicit_solution¶

MODplume.explicit_solution(Gamma, ze, biasFit=None)¶

Applies explicit solution to parameterize plume injection height

Parameters

biasFit (array_like, optional) – bias fit parameters. Default is m = 1, b = 0

Returns

  • zCL (float) – parameterized plume injection height [m]

  • THzCL (float) – ambient potential temperature at modelled zCL [K]
